pullRequest.title: [no ticket][risk=no] Puppeteer framework new component Dialog

nodes.bodyText: This method used to work only for the CREATE WORKSPACE button on new workspace form. There is a separate methods for dealing with DUPLICATE WORKSPACE button on duplicate workspace form. To avoid boilerplate code, it is now just one method that handles both button, waiting and pop-up dialog.
timeout: 0 broke screenshot when test fails. changing it back to 60 seconds so takeScreenshot works again.
dialog texts verifications on selected few lines of words.

This is a bit of a behavior change, where it will do all of them in parallel now instead of sequence. Is that okay? (I don't know if the pages need to load before you can get the tab selectors?)
It looks fine though, thinking about it conceptually, and this also seems better from a code standpoint! Nice job!
